titleStmt.title: The unkind Parents: or The languishing lamentation of two loyal lovers. To an excellent new tune. Licensed according to order.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for C[harles]. Bates, next the Crown-Cavern in West-Smithfield.,

notesStmt.note: Publisher's name, place and date of publication from Wing.
Verse: "Now fare thou well my dearest dear ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
